ygData.subject: Re: question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello. You ve come to the right place to ask questions and finding out about it before you buy it is a wise decision. Personally I think the game is
ygData.messageBody:
Hello. You've come to the right place to ask
questions and finding out about it before you buy it is a
wise decision.<br><br>Personally I think the game is
well worth it... after about 2 days of playing it
after I bought it I was addicted. EQ is the first game
thats ever been addictive to me.<br><br>EQ, to me, is a
place to go to interact with people from all over the
world and immerse myself in a role totally different
than the real world. I play to get away from the
reality, to kick back and relax and have tons of
fun.<br><br>In the game you run around a vast world spanning 5
continents (and soon to be a moon if my info on the new
expansion is correct) and hundreds of different zones in
search of relics that can complete your inventory and
while doing so you take down foes that appose you. All
the while your trying to become the best of your race
and class and make your god proud by following what
s/he stands for. Theres even some PvP servers that
allow you to take on other player
characters.<br><br>Umm about the demo; I'm not sure there is a demo out
there. If there is I've never seen it. If theres anymore
questions you need answered feel free to post or send me an
email at boggs87413_69@...
